select * from place where place_name like '%' || #{placeName} ||'%' and place_cert = 1

select i.IMAGE_URL_URL from IMAGE_URL i where i.PLACE_NO = #{placeNo}
select i.IMAGE_URL_File from IMAGE_URL i where i.PLACE_NO = #{placeNo}
select count(*) from place_like pl, place p where p.place_no =#{placeNo} and p.place_no=pl.place_no
